metadata.synopsis: Party read Raphael's Notes that contain a magic keyword that lifts up the defense on Orphic Hammer/Contract
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Launch CTY_Main_A2. Debug Book > 6. Set quest flags & options > 6. Act 3 (LOW) > 3. Lower City > ~27. House of HopeSteal Master Keyword3. Read Raphael's notes that you've received and close book UI

0.speaker: Player
0.text: A keyword - this'll help us get what we need from the Archive.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: A magic keyword. That'll help us in the Archive.
